item.title: Some Thoughts About Math
item.description: This is my first English blog article. Probably there are some grammatical errors, and thanks for your patient. Recently I am reading [A Mathematician's Lament]. With the discussion about problems traditional k12 math education, I was touched. The fisrt half of the book helped organize all I wanted to ask about my junior high school math. This paragraph is my story. My math was the worst in my junior high school.
